short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds IMDB link to CSFD movie pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Re-enables the functionality of the older version of CSFD.cz movie database, where the link to the respective movie page at IMDb.com was present on each movie's profile page. The link button is inserted below the social media sharing icons.

This extension is not affiliated with either CSFD nor IMDb.
